Handle SDK Error with Break.

#define BREAK_ON_IPP_ERROR (   sts,
  ret 
)
Value:
{ \
IppStatus temp_sts = (sts); \
if (ippStsNoErr != temp_sts) { \
if (ippStsContextMatchErr == temp_sts) { \
(ret) = kEpidMathErr; \
} else { \
(ret) = kEpidBadArgErr; \
} \
break; \
} \
}
